steps.section: Qubit4 Fluorometer Protocol: Invitrogen dsDNA HS Assay Kit (REF 32854)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ccbkf","text":"Preparing working solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9a5j","text":"Dilute the Qubit reagent 1:200 in Qubit buffer:   of Qubit dsDNA HS Reagent *200X (multiplied by number of samples + one extra sample) for every   of Qubit dsDNA HS Buffer (multiplied by number of samples + one extra sample). Make enough mix for the total number of samples including Standard #1 and Standard #2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":53,"length":28},{"style":"bold","offset":149,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":145,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"899EDEA311FB11EF92DD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"199","error":false,"guid":"899EDF3811FB11EF92DD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"37tl7","text":"Set up two assay tubes (Qubit assay tubes REF Q32856) for the standards (Standard #1 and Standard #2) and one assay tube for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
